gnat.utils
Class LeftRightContextAnalyzer

java.lang.Object
  gnat.utils.LeftRightContextAnalyzer

public class LeftRightContextAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class to analyze tokens appearing to the left and right of name matches. This class can be used to build context models used by the LeftRightContextFilter class.

Author:
Conrad
